defaultIssues.title: Kickoff & Onboarding
defaultIssues.description: Initial project setup, team introductions, and onboarding tasks. Establish communication channels and project management workflows.

defaultIssues.title: Discovery Recap
defaultIssues.description: Document and consolidate insights from the discovery call. Create project brief and align on scope, timeline, and deliverables.

defaultIssues.title: Milestone 1
defaultIssues.description: First major milestone. Specific deliverables to be determined based on project scope and requirements.

defaultIssues.title: Milestone 2
defaultIssues.description: Second major milestone. Specific deliverables to be determined based on project scope and requirements.

defaultIssues.title: QA & Review
defaultIssues.description: Quality assurance phase. Testing, review, and refinement of deliverables before client handover.

defaultIssues.title: Handover
defaultIssues.description: Final project handover. Deliver all assets, documentation, and provide training or support as needed.

projectDefaults.description: Project created automatically from Notion lead status change.
